alert.note: Alert for Montezuma (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 9:37PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following county, Montezuma. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 937 PM MDT, satellite and lightning data indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mesa Verde Natl Park and areas south of Mesa Verde towards the New Mexico border.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
